channel.title: Instant Mashed Potatoes on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Instant Mashed Potatoes on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Smashing Potatoes
item.description: Today in Tedium: If one was forced by the twisting of the arm to choose one item to get rid of on their Thanksgiving plate on Thursday, some people might choose turkey (mostly the vegetarians), and some others might choose cranberries (which aren’t hip anymore), but I promise you nobody—and I mean nobody—would choose the mashed potatoes. They are the glue of our thanksgiving meal, the most essential element, the only thing that must be served in some form.
